name: Click Kill Escape 2 - Stick Lab Edition
name_original: Click Kill Escape 2 - Stick Lab Edition
description:
You've been trapped! These sticks are doing some crazy experiments on you.. Get out and kick their asses! Punch in some faces, steal guns and destroy them!

There are some crazy weapons scattered throughout the labs so find something destructive and wreck all sticks that stand in your way! Can you escape?
